# ILiquidityBootstrappingPoolFactory

## Functions

### create

```solidity
function create(
    string name,
    string symbol,
    address[] tokens,
    uint256[] weights,
    uint256 swapFeePercentage,
    address owner,
    bool swapEnabledOnStart
) external returns (address)
```

| Name | Type | Description |

| `symbol` | string |  |
| `tokens` | address[] |  |
| `weights` | uint256[] |  |
| `swapFeePercentage` | uint256 |  |
| `owner` | address |  |
| `swapEnabledOnStart` | bool |  |
